title: Bitcoin's ‘De-Dollarization’ Narrative Loses Ground As USD Tightens Its Grip on International Transactions
description: The crypto market's de-dollarization expectations look premature as the greenback remained the preferred currency in international transactions in 2023.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Parents Seek Dismissal of 'Threadbare' FTX Lawsuit
description: Joseph Bankman and Barbara Fried are seeking to have bankrupt crypto exchange FTX's lawsuit against them dismissed.

title: Ripple CEO expects more crypto ETF approvals: Davos 2024
description:
Brad Garlinghouse expects the Securities and Exchange Commission to approve further cryptocurrency-related exchange-traded funds now that Bitcoin ETFs are a reality.

Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse believes the approval of several Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the United States will pave the way for similar cryptocurrency investment products to launch in 2024.

Speaking to CNBC correspondent Arjun Kharpal in Davos on Jan. 16, Garlinghouse stopped short of explicitly predicting an XRP ETF would be approved by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) but expects an Ethereum ETF to get the green light in the near term future.

“I think it’s a certainty. I’m not going to put a horizon on the time, but I think there will be other ETFs for sure,” Garlinghouse said in an interview on CNBC at the Filecoin Sanctuary, which borders the World Economic Forum compound in the Swiss town.

Read more

title: Bitcoin spot ETF volumes pass 'insane' $10B as GBTC sales seen slowing
description:
Bitcoin ETF volumes leave no doubt about the road forward despite BTC price hurdles over the past week, analysts conclude.

Spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded funds (ETFs) have seen eight-figure trading volumes in just three days since their United States launch.

Data from Bloomberg Intelligence analyst James Seyffart uploaded to X (formerly Twitter) shows that as of Jan. 16, spot ETF volumes had passed $10 billion.

Bitcoin’s newest ETFs have caused controversy since their Jan. 11 debut, with frenetic trading activity having little tangible impact on BTC price growth.

Read more
